definition: trematoda/fluke/trematode worm, approx 6000 species, mostly parasite, incl. on humans
to breathe/to suck in/to absorb/to inhale
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
Class Trematoda/fluke/trematode worm, a parasite incl. on humans
schistosome, parasitic flatworm causing snail fever (bilharzia or schistosomiasis)
digenetic trematode worm (i.e. from Order Digenea 複殖目|复殖目)

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical value of B-Type ultrasonic diagnosis of clonorchiosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討利用B型超聲診斷華支睾吸蟲病的臨牀價值。

sentences.english: No positive reaction was found in both paragonimiasis and clonorchiasis.
sentences.chinese: 與肺吸蟲病和肝吸蟲病患者血清之間未出現交叉反應。

sentences.english: No positive reaction was found in both paragonimiasis and clonorchiasis.
sentences.chinese: 與肺吸蟲病和肝吸蟲病患者血清之間未出現交叉反應。

sentences.english: For schistosomiasis: xiong huang with nan gua zi (pumpkin seeds), bin nang.
sentences.chinese: 血吸蟲病，可與南瓜子，檳榔等同用。

sentences.english: Epidemic Status and Countermeasure of Clonorchiasis in Guangxi;
sentences.chinese: 提出了“成癮型”流行區華支睾吸蟲病的防制對策。

sentences.english: Objective To survey the Clonorchis sinensis infection status in Shuikou Town.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解開平市水口鎮人體華支睾吸蟲感染狀況。

sentences.english: Schistosomes also possess what seems to be a cloak of invisibility: an unusual covering known as the tegument .
sentences.chinese: 血吸蟲還有一種如同隱形披風的特殊外衣，稱爲體壁。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the application of B ultrasonic examination on the diagnosis of clonorchiasis .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討B超在華支睾吸蟲病診斷中的應用價值。

sentences.english: It had no cross-reaction with Clonorchiasis.
sentences.chinese: 與華枝睾吸蟲病無交叉反應。

sentences.english: They are intermediate hosts of lung flukes.
sentences.chinese: 他們爲肺癌吸蟲的中間宿主。

sentences.english: Praziquantel is the only available treatment against all forms of schistosomiasis.
sentences.chinese: 吡喹酮是唯一可用於治療各種類型血吸蟲病的藥物。

sentences.english: Objective To construct a multivalent DNA vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 目的構建日本血吸蟲多價DNA疫苗。

sentences.english: To investigate the application of B-ultrasonic examination on the diagnosis of clonorchiasis.
sentences.chinese: 探討B超在華支睾吸蟲病診斷中的應用價值。

sentences.english: The cloning and expression of the gene encoding S japonicum tropomyosin had been successfully made.
sentences.chinese: 日本血吸蟲原肌球蛋白編碼基因克隆和原核表達成功。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the risk factors of cerebral schistosomiasis japonica .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腦型血吸蟲病發病的危險因素。

sentences.english: Infection with liver flukes has been reported to be associated with some liver and gall diseases, especially the cholangiocarcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 肝吸蟲感染與一些肝膽疾病，特別是膽管癌有關。
